string.value: I've heard that #p2060005# has furthered his research and found a way to upgrade my existing mount. A faster monster to ride? I should go see #p2060005# in Aqua Road immediately!

I visited the Aquarium and #p2060005# has indeed found a way to make the mounts bigger, faster and stronger! However, he needs #b#t4000264#, #t4000266#, and #t4000267##k to make the experiement a success. He asked for a "donation" of 50 million mesos to develop the technology for monster and human to co-exist. That's some expensive research! He must be raking it in...

#i4000264##t4000264# #b#c4000264#/600#k
#i4000266##t4000266# #b#c4000266#/400#k
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267#/400#k

It took a bit of time, but I returned with the needed items and "donation" he asked for. #p2060005# made my #t1902000# into a #t1902001#. What a difference! My mount is so much sharper and stronger than before! I can run over almost anything now!

Ah! You learned the monster riding skill from me! You have a Pig... Wow! You really live with a monster! And it doesn't attack you? My research has been proven as viable! I'm as happy as a pig in mud!

You'll be happy to know that I learned how to strengthen monsters for riding a few days ago! The name tells you how strong it is: #b#t1902001##k~ Haha. Isn't it cool? What do you say? Would you like to strengthen your monster?

I knew it! Ok, to strengthen your monster, I'll need 600 #b#t4000264#, 400 #t4000266# , 400 #t4000267##k. Upgraded monsters will be faster and tougher so you'll need many ingredients. When you have everything, come back and we'll continue! See you then!

Ah, right. I'm sorry but it costs a lot for this type of research and I'm a bit short on funds. A donation of #b50 million mesos#k should do it. I can study further into the coexistence of humans and monsters. Thank you!
Huh? You don't want a stronger mount? I suppose you're happy with your Pig now, I won't press you any more. When you change your mind, let me know!
Wow~ You have everything that I need. Excellent! It's easy to strengthen monsters with this. I'll even change the color of the mane to gray!
Ok. Your #t1902000# is changed to #b#t1902001##k. I did it! Try it out!
Remember, when tired, #t1902001# can't run that well. Please be careful!

Hmmm...these ingredients are not sufficient to strengthen the monster. If I don't have all the ingredients, it's impossible to get on #t1902001#. The ingredients are #b600 #t4000264#, 400 #t4000266#, 400 #t4000267# , and a 50 million meso donation#k. Come back when you have everything!
